Change Log
==========

Release v0.1 (January 31, 2018)
-------------------------------

- Initial release:

  Basic plot methods:

  - data.vgplot.line()
  - data.vgplot.scatter()
  - data.vgplot.area()
  - data.vgplot.bar()
  - data.vgplot.barh()
  - data.vgplot.hist()
  - data.vgplot.kde()
  - data.vgplot.denity()
  - data.vgplot.hexbin()
  - data.vgplot.heatmap()

  Specialized plot methods

  - pdvega.plotting.scatter_matrix()
  - pdvega.plotting.andrews_curves()
  - pdvega.plotting.parallel_coordinates()
  - pdvega.plotting.lag_plot()

  Plot objects:

  - pdvega.Axes
